title: VLSM Calculator
description: Design efficient subnets with Variable Length Subnet Masking for optimal address space utilization.

networkAddress.label: Network Address
networkAddress.tooltip: First IP address in the subnet - identifies the network

broadcastAddress.label: Broadcast Address
broadcastAddress.tooltip: Last IP address in the subnet - sends to all hosts

firstUsableHost.label: First Usable Host
firstUsableHost.tooltip: First IP address available for host assignment

lastUsableHost.label: Last Usable Host
lastUsableHost.tooltip: Last IP address available for host assignment

subnetMask.label: Subnet Mask
subnetMask.tooltip: Defines which portion of IP represents network vs host

wildcardMask.label: Wildcard Mask
wildcardMask.tooltip: Inverse of subnet mask - used in access control lists

binaryMask.label: Binary Mask
binaryMask.tooltip: Binary representation of the subnet mask

hostBits.label: Host Bits
hostBits.tooltip: Number of bits available for host addressing
